Class ShoppingCart

java.lang.Object
cop4331.model.customer.ShoppingCart
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShoppingCart extends Object implements Serializable

Represents a shopping cart that holds products.

Author:
Jeremy Ladanowski, Benjamin Carver
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getCartItems

      public HashMap<ProductComponent,Integer> getCartItems()

      Gets the cart items from the Shopping Cart.

      Returns:
      A HashMap of cart items stored inside the ShoppingCart.

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(ProductComponent product, int quantity)

      Adds a product to the ShoppingCart. If the product exists in the cart, add the quantities together.

      Parameters:
      product - The product to add.
      quantity - The amount of the product to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If quantity is less than or equal to 0 or if product is null.

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct(ProductComponent product)

      Removes a product from the shopping cart.

      Parameters:
      product - The product to remove.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the product is null or

    • updateProductQuantity

      public void updateProductQuantity(ProductComponent product, int quantity)

      Updates the quantity of a product in the shopping cart. If the desired quantity is 0, the product is removed from the shopping cart.

      Parameters:
      product - The product whose quantity is changing.
      quantity - The new quantity of the product in the cart.

    • calculateTotal

      public double calculateTotal()

      Calculates the total sale price of all items in the cart.

      Returns:
      The total sale price of all items in the cart.

    • toString

      public String toString()

      Converts the items in the shopping cart and their quantities into a string. Used exclusively for debugging purposes.

      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The string of the contents of the shopping cart.

    • getTotalQuantity

      public int getTotalQuantity()

      Gets the total quantity of items in the cart.

      Returns:
      The total quantity of items in the cart.

    • clear

      public void clear()

      Clears the items currently stored in the cart.
